mapper.sql: student_id, student_name, student_sex, student_identity, student_is_graduation, student_school, student_specialty, student_wechat, student_mailbox, student_study_id, student_city, student_address, student_parent_phone, student_parent_name, student_urgent, student_phone, student_class_id, student_room, student_photo, student_alter_time, student_null1, student_null2
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sybida_student
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT a.*,b.class_num FROM `sybida_student` a JOIN sybida_class b on a.student_class_id = b.class_id
a.student_name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and a.student_null2 != 0
mapper.insert: insert into sybida_student (student_id, student_name, student_sex, student_identity, student_is_graduation, student_school, student_specialty, student_wechat, student_mailbox, student_study_id, student_city, student_address, student_parent_phone, student_parent_name, student_urgent, student_phone, student_class_id, student_room, student_photo, student_alter_time, student_null1, student_null2) values (#{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{studentIdentity,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{studentIsGraduation,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{studentSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentSpecialty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentWechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentMailbox,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentStudyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentParentPhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{studentParentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentUrgent,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{studentPhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{studentClassId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentRoom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentAlterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{studentNull1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentNull2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

student_id = #{record.studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

student_name = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
student_sex = #{studentSex,jdbcType=CHAR},

student_is_graduation = #{studentIsGraduation,jdbcType=TINYINT},

student_wechat = #{studentWechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

student_city = #{studentCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sybida_student set student_name = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_sex = #{studentSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, student_identity = #{studentIdentity,jdbcType=CHAR}, student_is_graduation = #{studentIsGraduation,jdbcType=TINYINT}, student_school = #{studentSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_specialty = #{studentSpecialty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_wechat = #{studentWechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_mailbox = #{studentMailbox,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_study_id = #{studentStudyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, student_city = #{studentCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_address = #{studentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_parent_phone = #{studentParentPhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, student_parent_name = #{studentParentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_urgent = #{studentUrgent,jdbcType=CHAR}, student_phone = #{studentPhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, student_class_id = #{studentClassId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, student_room = #{studentRoom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_photo = #{studentPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_alter_time = #{studentAlterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, student_null1 = #{studentNull1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_null2 = #{studentNull2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sybida_student set student_sex = #{studentSex}, student_identity = #{studentIdentity}, student_is_graduation = #{studentIsGraduation }, student_school = #{studentSchool}, student_specialty = #{studentSpecialty}, student_wechat = #{studentWechat}, student_mailbox = #{studentMailbox}, student_study_id = #{studentStudyId}, student_city = #{studentCity}, student_address = #{studentAddress}, student_parent_phone = #{studentParentPhone}, student_parent_name = #{studentParentName}, student_urgent = #{studentUrgent}, student_phone = #{studentPhone}, student_class_id = #{studentClassId}, student_room = #{studentRoom}, student_photo = #{studentPhoto} where student_id = #{studentId}
mapper.select: select sv.vitae_id,sv.vitae_level,ss.study_aspect,sv.vitae_url,sv.vitae_alter_time,sv.vitae_is_read from sybida_vitae sv,sybida_study ss,sybida_student st WHERE sv.vitae_student_id = #{vitaeStudentId} and ss.study_id = st.student_study_id and sv.vitae_student_id = st.student_id order by sv.vitae_alter_time desc
select se.* ,st.teach_name from sybida_vitae_evaluate se,sybida_teach st where vitae_evaluate_id= #{vitaeId} and st.teach_id=se.vitae_evaluate_user_id
SELECT a.*,b.class_num FROM `sybida_student` a JOIN sybida_class b on a.student_class_id = b.class_id where a.student_null2 != 0
select student_id,student_name,student_null1 from sybida_student where student_class_id=#{classId}
